title.en: Biryuu Enshoutan ~Jikokouteikan ga Gekitei na Dragon-kyuu Bishoujo Maou o, Yuusha ga Icharabu de Taijisuru Ohanashi~

altTitles.ja: 美龍艶笑譚～自己肯定感が激低なドラゴン級美少女魔王を、勇者がイチャラブで退治するお話～

altTitles.en: A Story About a Hero Exterminating a Dragon-Class Beautiful Girl Demon Queen, Who Has Very Low Self-Esteem, With Love!

description.en:
Iver is a dragon maou who stopped trying after historical heroes defeated her every time she resurrected. But the present day hero, Mirio, who found the holy sword by pure chance falls in love with her. And thus forms the couple of the maou with no self-esteem and the dopey hero. This is a story of how they come to know each other, fight, and find happiness.

---
**Links:**
- [Alternative Official Raw on Magazine Pocket](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/3269754496790830789)
- [Alternative Official Raw on Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/56470)
- [Alternative Official Raw on Kodansha Comic Plus](https://kc.kodansha.co.jp/title?code=1000041454)
description.id:
Iver adalah maou naga yang berhenti mencoba setelah pahlawan sejarah mengalahkannya setiap kali dia dibangkitkan. Tapi pahlawan masa kini, Mirio, yang menemukan pedang suci secara kebetulan jatuh cinta padanya. Dan dengan demikian membentuk pasangan maou tanpa harga diri dan pahlawan tolol. Ini adalah kisah tentang bagaimana mereka saling mengenal, bertarung, dan menemukan kebahagiaan.

Berdasarkan novel hentai.
description.ja:
何度復活しても歴代勇者に敗北し、心が折れてしまった龍魔族の魔王・イヴェール。伝説の聖剣を偶然手にした当代の新米勇者・ミリオは、そんな彼女に恋をしてしまった！　しかして自信喪失中の魔王＆天然勇者のコンビ結成！　二人は身体を重ね、冒険の旅に出る！

魔王の失われた笑顔を取り戻せ！ 新米勇者が綱渡りの大奮闘！ 異世界シリアスコメディ幕開け！

title.en: Golden Light Gratia, The Child Loved By God

altTitles.pt-br: Luz Dourada Gratia, a criança amada por Deus

altTitles.ko: 신의 사랑을 받는 아이, 황금빛 그라티아

description.en:
Gratia, a girl considered useless and despised by her family, has a revealing dream where a mysterious man predicts a great future for her. She soon discovers that she is the lost daughter of the influential Luciffero family. In a surprising event, after being attacked, a golden light erupts from Gratia, forcing everyone around her to close their eyes.

When the light dissipates, young Gratia disappears and in her place an adult version of herself appears, with distinct features of Luciffero. With an imposing stature and undeniable beauty, she comes across Nea, her mother, and realizes that the transformation expected for the future happened that day.

This was the moment when ten-year-old Gratia and twenty-year-old Gratia switched bodies for the first time.
description.pt-br:
Gratia, uma menina considerada inútil e desprezada pela família, tem um sonho revelador onde um homem misterioso prevê um grande futuro para ela. Ela logo descobre que é a filha perdida da influente família Luciffero. Num acontecimento surpreendente, após ser atacada, uma luz dourada irrompe de Gratia, obrigando todos ao seu redor a fecharem os olhos.

Quando a luz se dissipa, a jovem Gratia desaparece e em seu lugar aparece uma versão adulta dela mesma, com características distintas de Luciffero. De estatura imponente e beleza inegável, ela se depara com Nea, sua mãe, e percebe que a transformação esperada para o futuro aconteceu naquele dia.

Este foi o momento em que Gratia, de dez anos, e Gratia, de vinte, trocaram de corpo pela primeira vez.

altTitles.en: Napoleon

altTitles.ja: ナポレオン 獅子の時代

description.en: This is a story of the life of Napoleon. The tale begins just before the Battle of Austerlitz. Then, it jumps back to 1769 to tell the story of Napoleon's life from the very beginning, including the circumstances of his birth, his childhood on Corsica, and his difficulties as a Corsican boy in a French school. All of these experiences eventually culminate in his becoming the famous Emperor of the French.
description.ja: フランス革命に始まり、イタリア戦役を経て、皇帝への道を駆け進む一人の英雄ナポレオン・ボナパルトの生涯を描く、壮大な英雄譚!!　血みどろ汗の臭いムンムンな一人の「漢」が、獅子のごとく吠える。吼える！　フランス近代史重厚ストーリー!!

title.en: A Big Shot in the Imperial Palace

altTitles.zh: Wo Zai Huang Gong Dang Ju Ju

altTitles.vi: Ta Làm Lớn Ở Hậu Cung

altTitles.en: I'm Becoming a Master of the Imperial Palace!
I'm a Tyrant in His Majesty's Harem
Princess in the Prince's Harem

description.en:
"Season 2: Prince Ning's daughter always wanted to find a husband who was ignorant, innocent, delicate, and home-loving. When she got married, she found her husband was totally different from her imagination. This strong man was trusted by the Emperor. He also removed her disguises one after another. Prince Rui always thought his princess consort was a gentle, quiet, frail, graceful, and timid girl until he found he was the delicate and fragile husband in her eyes… After that, he said to Zhao Guangyang who was so powerful and might, ""Honey, playtime is over, let's go home!"" Zhang Guangyang replied, ""…Okay""  
Season 1: I am Wei Yiyi. I am a beautiful girl but the Emperor refused to accept me as his concubine because I was too ugly for him. This is totally unacceptable for me. I made up my mind to make him regret it. Hmph, the Emperor refused to accept me as your concubine. I will disguise myself as a male painter to the royal court so that I could make trouble for the Emperor. Is this girl too ugly? Great! She will become a national beauty in my painting. Hmm, His Majesty is in great shape. I will make an album of paintings for him, which will be distributed throughout the nation. In this way, his caricature will have a niche in the temple of fame! "

altTitles.en: Dungeon Meal

altTitles.th: สูตรลับตำรับดันเจียน

altTitles.ja: ダンジョン飯

altTitles.en: Delicious in Dungeon

description.en:
After his sister is devoured by a dragon and losing all their supplies in a failed dungeon raid, Laios and his party are determined to save his sister before she gets digested. Completely broke and having to resort to eating monsters as food, they meet a dwarf who will introduce them to the world of Dungeon Meshi - delicious cuisine made from ingredients such as the flesh of giant bats, walking mushrooms, or even screaming mandrakes.  
  
---
- **Ranked 1st in the 2016 Kono Manga ga Sugoi! for Male Readers (Shonen/Seinen)**
description.es: Después de que su hermana fuera devorada por un dragón y habiendo perdido todas sus provisiones, Laios y su equipo están decididos a salvar a Farin antes de que sea digerida por la gran bestia. Es así como conocen a un singular enano que los introducirá al mundo gastronómico de las mazmorras: delicias elaboradas a partir de la carne de murciélagos gigantes, hongos caminantes y mandrágoras chillonas.
description.id:
Seorang penjelajah muda, Laios, bersama kawan-kawannya mendapat serangan hebat dari seekor naga jauh di lantai terdalam Dungeon. Mereka kehilangan seluruh uang dan perbekalan, bahkan seorang anggota tim! Walau ingin bergegas kembali dan menyelamatkan rekannya, mereka dihalangi satu masalah besar, “Tanpa makanan dan uang, mereka pasti akan kelaparan di tengah penjelajahan!” Namun, Laios mendapat ide cemerlang, “Kita makan monster saja!”. Slime, kalajengking, basilisk, mandrake, dan kelelawar raksasa… Tidak ada satu monster pun yang luput dari perut-perut keroncongan di Dungeon!! (Gramedia.com) 

[Terjemah Indonesia](https://www.gramedia.com/search?q=delicious%20in%20dungeon)
description.pt-br:
Depois de perder todos os seus suprimentos e provisões e também ter sua irmã devorada por um dragão durante uma expedição na masmorra, Laios e seu grupo estão determinados a salvá-la antes que ela seja completamente digerida pelo dragão.
Mas estando completamente falidos e tendo que recorrer a comer monstros como alimento, eles encontram um anão que os apresentará ao mundo de Dungeon Meshi – uma deliciosa culinária feita com ingredientes como a carne de morcegos gigantes, cogumelos andarilhos e até mesmo mandrágoras.

altTitles.en: I Will Become the Hero's Mother
I'll Become the Warrior's Mother
I Became the Mother of the Warrior

description.en:
"You may be my wife but, I won't lay a single finger on you."

"Really? Then can I touch you?"

"...What?"

About 20 years later, the world will be in ruins because of the invasion of the beasts. There's only one way to stop the destruction. To marry the duke who is called a monster, and have his child who will become the hero in the future!

Elena who saw a glimpse of the future succeeded in marrying him but...

"Are we going to continue to not do anything?"

I wanted to get it quickly out of the way, but my husband's impregnable fortress is stronger than I could have imagined!

"Take it off! Why aren't you taking it off?! Are your clothes part of your skin?"

Will Elena be able to safely give birth to the hero and save the world?

title.en: In My Death, I Became My Brother's Regret

altTitles.zh: 死后我成了哥哥的朱砂痣

altTitles.zh-ro: Si Hou Wo Chengle Gege De Zhusha Zhi
Sǐ Hòu Wǒ Chéngle Gēgē De Zhūshā Zhì

description.en: The half-demon, Jing Mo, was killed by his older brother Jue Ming when his demonic energy lost control. He found himself in the body of a young man named "Bai Shu", and this body seemed... abnormal. Due to suspicious circumstances revolving around the disappearance of Jing Mo's body, Jue Ming kept an eye on Jing Mo who desperately hid his true identity. With one of them hiding a secret and the other looking for the truth, the pair landed in the middle of a life-or-death struggle that came with being "Bai Shu"...
description.zh: 有着魔修混血的京墨因一次魔气缠身，被哥哥决明杀死，睁眼后却重生到一名叫“白术”的少年身上，而这具身体……并不正常。他隐藏自己是京墨的身份，却被决明以找出弟弟尸身失踪真相为由留在身边。一个要隐藏身份，一个要寻找真相，两人循着“白术”这一身份被卷入一场生死之争中……

description.en: My bias is the City God! It's a story about how a non mainstream boy with unfortunate genetics causes all sorts of trouble in a peaceful city while chasing after the City God... "It doesn't matter if they're a ghost or a monster, nothing can stop my bias Xuming God! Not even the God himself!"

altTitles.en: The Top Couple Is a Bit Sweet

description.en: Song Yan and Wen Li are a well-known contract couple in the entertainment industry. Ever since they are married, they are not in business and have not been tied together. Countless fans lament,  yet many ship them together. That is until the two of them officially announced their participation in a national-level variety show for couples and they reluctantly began to come back to their career. During the recording process of the variety show, the two of them slowly discovered that their bond had already been firmly tied several years ago......

altTitles.ja: ソードアート・オンライン・ユナイタル・リング

altTitles.en: SAO Unital Ring

description.en: A year has passed since Kirito and Asuna’s return from the Underworld. With them is Alice, who has been given a physical body. But their peace is quickly broken when the three are suddenly thrust into an unfamiliar game, Unital Ring. This new world is a survival MMO that fuses together every VRMMO created with the Seed program. As soon as it starts, Kirito finds himself with nothing but his underwear. Now, he’s got to challenge a mysterious VRMMOSVG under desperate circumstances!
description.es-la: Ha pasado un año desde el regreso de Kirito y Asuna del Underworld. Con ellos está Alice, que ha recibido un cuerpo físico. Pero su paz se rompe rápidamente cuando los tres se ven empujados de repente a un juego desconocido, Unital Ring. Este nuevo mundo es un MMO de supervivencia que fusiona todos los VRMMO creados con el programa "The Seed". Nada más empezar, Kirito se encuentra sin nada más que su ropa interior. Ahora, ¡Tiene que desafiar a un misterioso VRMMOSVG en circunstancias desesperadas!

altTitles.en: Haven't Seen You For Years

description.en: There are thousands of evil spirits in the world, half of whom reside in the city of Shining Night. As for the remaining half, all of them died in the Northern Region of Canglang, which was held by the Heavenly Host, Xiao Fu Xuan. The only devil who had been imprisoned for 25 years is still alive. And, it is Wu Xing Xue, the Lord of Shining Night City.

altTitles.en: Body Search
Looking for the body

altTitles.ja: カラダ探し

description.en: Look forwards to the ghost story of the red person. "Hey, Asuka… search for my body". At school in the middle of the night, Asuka and her friends search for the scattered body-parts. If they don't find the entire body, the 9th November is repeated and the red person will continue to kill them. Who is the red person? Why is Haruka asking them to search for the body-parts?

title.en: The Snake Demon Wants to Flee

description.en: An extreme two-sided war of romance between a flirtatious snake demon that claims to fuck the gods VS a righteous but cold Daoist who only knows how to fight! Due to an unexpected mishap, the Snake Demon King could only bond with the (weird) righteous genius. This story about how the Snake Demon King tries to undo the bonding while trying to figure out how to take back his throne, but loses his body and mind in the process.

Thirty years ago, the young Peiking Opera performer Yen Tieh-hua was wrongly convicted of the murder of her own family and sent to prison. Twenty years later she died while still incarcerated. Yet, today, this same woman has mysteriously returned as a superpowered teen in Peiking Opera costume, determined to avenge the massacre of her family.

altTitles.en: Leveling Up With the Gods
Leveling With the Gods

altTitles.th: เลเวลอัปไปกับเทพเจ้า

altTitles.ja: 神と共にレベルアップ

description.en:
“Maybe Inner Gods can never defeat Outer Gods…” so thought Yuwon Kim, a plucky, high-ranking warrior, after a bitter defeat.

But Yuwon is too tenacious to give up. His loss becomes the dawn of a new journey as a returnee. With renewed determination, Yuwon starts back from where he began, smashing monster after monster and relearning his skills before taking on the Tower once again.

But can he fight his way through the tutorials and level up once more, or will his conquest crumble before him?

---

description.ja:
異界の神、アウターゴッドと呼ばれる存在が支配する世界。一番最後に塔へ入り一番最後までインナーゴッドたちと共に戦った人間、神野 流星。 そんな彼も結局はアウターゴッドに破れてしまう。 越えられない壁に絶望を感じていた最後の瞬間、時間を司る神であるクロノスから新たにチャンスが与えられる。 そうして彼は、前世の記憶を持ったまま過去へ回帰することに――。 再び塔を登り、力と仲間を手に入れた神野は、今度こそアウターゴッドに勝つことができるだろうか？不滅の神話に挑む人間の物語が今始まる！

description.ko:
이계의 신, 아우터 갓(Outer God).

하늘을 닫는 절망과 늪에 빠진 좌절, 탄생하지 못한 자, 어리석은 혼돈.
평범한 사람들은 그저 바라보는 것만으로 목숨을 잃어 버릴 그 존재들이 세상을 휘젓는 지금…
수 년간의 싸움 끝에, 최후의 생존자들이 낸 결론.

"이너(Inner)는 아우터(Outer)를 이길 수 없다."

그 순간, 시간을 다루는 신격을 지닌 존재 크로노스는 자신을 희생시켜 시계태엽을 되돌린다.

"이길 수 없겠지. 지금은 말이야."

"옛 세계선으로 돌아가라. 그리고 다시 시작해."

모든 신들에게 지목을 받아 과거로 돌아간 최후의 1인.
가장 뒤늦게 탑을 올라, 가장 마지막까지 신들과 함께 싸운 인간, 김유원.

"이너(Inner)는 아우터(Outer)를 이길 수 없다. 그렇다면…"

"이기는 건 나야."

그는 마지막 순간을 함께하던 동료들을 다시 모아,
아우터와의 싸움을 승리로 끝낼 수 있을까?

description.ru:
Он был храбрейшим и сильнейшим из всех, но даже его в самом конце ожидало лишь отчаяние. В последние мгновения ему был дан еще один шанс. Благодаря жертве бога времени «Хроноса» его судьба еще не была предрешена. Вернувшись в прошлое, он снова попытается взобраться на «Башню» со своим непревзойденным талантом, чтобы побороть древнее зло, которое грозит уничтожить этот мир.

description.th:
"อินเนอร์อย่างพวกเราไม่สามารถเอาชนะเอาเตอร์ได้"

เมื่อแรงเกอร์ในหอคอยลงความเห็นเป็นเสียงเดียวกัน
'คิมยูวอน' มนุษย์ผู้แกร่งกล้าเพียงหนึ่งเดียวในหมู่เทพเจ้า
จึงถูกเลือกให้ย้อนกลับมายังอดีตเพื่อเริ่มต้นทุกอย่างใหม่อีกครั้ง

เขาจะสามารถทำตามแผนที่ทุกคนช่วยกันวางไว้
และแกร่งขึ้นกว่าเดิมจนกลับไปเอาชนะ 'เอาเตอร์ก็อด'
ทวยเทพที่ลุกล้ำเข้ามาจากนอกหอคอยได้หรือไม่?

description.zh:

description.en: In this story set in the early 1920s, Tamahiko is the son of a wealthy family, but his life is changed forever when an accident cripples his right arm. No longer considered by his father as an heir, he is shuffled off into the country, to live out of sight. The teenage Tamahiko shuts himself in his new home, bitterly thinking of it as the place where he will die. One day, he learns that his father has 'bought' him a bride to take care of him, when the young teen girl named Yuzuki arrives at his door. She comes into his life like an innocent ray of sunshine, and Tamahiko's view of the world and his life starts changing bit-by-bit.
description.ru:
На дворе 1920й год (эпоха Тайсё). Тамахико — один из наследников богатой семьи. Однако, получив увечье, из-за которого парализовало правую руку Тамахико, отец семейства счел, что такой сын в качестве наследника ему не нужен и отправляет его в одно из своих имений на задворках захолустного села, как говорится, из сердца вон и с глаз долой. Тамахико замыкается в себе, перестает общаться с внешним миром и впадает в глубокую депрессию, а ведь ему лишь 17! Неизвестно, чем бы кончилась вся эта история, если бы отец, в один прекрасный день, не купил Тамахико женушку Юдзуки, которая незатейливо оказалась на пороге жилища Тамахико и постучалась в его двери. Вся прелесть в том, что Юдзуки милый и невинный лучик солнечного света в угрюмой непогожей жизни нашего героя. Жизни, которая начинает преображаться с каждым новым днем.  


---
description.pt-br: Nesta história passada no início dos anos 1920, Tamahiko é o filho de uma família rica, mas a vida dele muda para sempre quando um acidente machuca o seu braço direito. Não sendo mais considerado o herdeiro pelo seu pai, ele é enxotado para fora do país para se perder de vista. O adolescente Tamahiko se tranca na sua casa nova, amargamente pensando que será o lugar onde morrerá. Um dia, ele fica sabendo, que o seu pai "comprou" uma noiva para tomar conta dele, quando uma garota chamada Yuzuki aparece na sua porta. Ela entra na sua vida como um inocente raio de sol, e a perspectiva do mundo de Tamahiko vai mudando pouco a pouco.

description.en: During the Xiande period of the Dazhou dynasty, the Prince of Jianxing, Shen Wei, suffered defeat at the Chashi river in the northeast, leading to the Six Prefectures of Zhongbo almost falling to external foes. Shen Zechuan, meanwhile, was arrested and taken to the capital, to be the target of everyone's hatred as the surviving villain. When the young son of the Prince of Libei, Xiao Chiye, heard the news, he came and delivered a ruthless blow that nearly cost Shen Zechuan his life. Unexpectedly, the latter, who had seemed weak, was actually quite fierce, turning around and biting him, causing the former to bleed profusely. Henceforth, an enmity developed between the two, with the strife continuing both within and outside the court. Amidst this open and secret conflict, the true reason for Shen Wei's defeat was surprisingly discovered.

After the discussions with the temple master and head priest ended, Myne won the right to be treated as a noble with the role of a blue-robed shrine maiden apprentice.   
Work in the temple began and Myne could read books in the long-awaited temple library.   
However, there were many problems in the temple, such as adapting to the class system and dealing with the problem children assigned to her as attendants.   
Overcome adversity to be able to read books in peace!   
A biblio-fantasy written for book lovers and bookworms! The second part begins!

description.en:
One day, my life suddenly come to an end, but I reincarnated as a the villainess of a romantic novel who is obsessed with and stalks the male lead, ultimately getting sentenced to death for trying to kill the female lead. I decided to try to avoid that by leaving the capital and living peacefully in the countryside, however, my dad requested that I come back to the capital because there was a huge mess going: it was reported that the royal heir who was believed to have died 7 years ago is actually alive! The little prince also just so happens to be the nephew of the male lead, who is now looking for him!! I didn’t want to get involved with that but unfortunately on my way to the capital, I rescued a little beggar child who turned out to be the lost royal heir and who is now extremely attached to me. In the original story, the female lead was supposed to find him so she could have the opportunity to meet the male lead, but what will happen to my peaceful life now that the original flow of the story seems to be changing?!!

---
After being reborn as a stalker villainess destined to die for trying to kill Archduke Calix Elluiden's lover, Charlize Lienta fled from the capital to stay away from the archduke at all costs. But her plan goes awry when she returns a year later and rescues a poor boy on the streets... because he turns out to be Sasha, Calix's long-lost nephew! Given her infamous reputation as Calix's stalker, will Charlize succeed in returning Sasha without raising the archduke's suspicions?

---

description.fr: Un jour, je me suis souvenue de ma vie d'avant. Ma deuxième vie est dans un roman et je suis une méchante qui est morte d'obsession pour le protagoniste masculin. À ce rythme, j'allai mourir. J'ai donc déménagé à la campagne et vis maintenant calmement. Mais mon père m'a appelée. La capitale devient folle, on dit que l'empereur Seon a disparu... Le petit garçon que j'ai ramassé en pensant à ma vie antérieure était le neveu du premier rôle masculin! Je ne dérangerai plus jamais Votre Altesse. - Je vous ai envoyé cette lettre. Je suis condamnée. *** Étonnamment, il aurait pu être plus ruiné ici. La sculpture du futur dont j'ai été témoin accidentellement était le début. [ 'Oh, je me demande quel genre de visage aura la princesse Rienta. Le père est mort à sa place pour la sauver.' ] Vous devez établir un contact visuel avec le personnage principal masculin à une distance proche.
description.uk: Одного разу я згадала своє попереднє життя. Моє друге життя - в романі. Я була лиходійкою, яка померла через одержимість головним героєм. Аби не загинути, я переїхала в село й живу собі спокійно, і ось якось зі мною зв'язався батько: «Столиця божеволіє. Кажуть, що ерцгерцог шукає загубленого імператора». Хлопчик, якого я підібрала, був племінником головного героя??? "Я більше ніколи не потурбую Вашу Світлість". - Я власноруч написала це. Я приречена!!!

description.ar:
ا عندما يخرج الشرير الحقيقي الوحيد في الرواية أخذ رجلًا جميلًا وتم ترويضه لبقية حياته. بعد أن دفع مخاوفه إلى أقصى حد ، تعلم كيف يتوسل منها ، ليصبح وحشًا لا يمكنه الهروب أبدًا ، حتى لو تم فك رباطه. ومع ذلك ، يقع الوحش في حب المرأة التي تنقذه ، ويصبح الإمبراطور بجانبه ، ويعاقب الشرير بالقيود الأبدية. بعد القصة ، استولت على جسد الشرير في ذلك الوقت عندما كانت في منتصف الطريق لترويض الرجل الرئيسي. ……ماذا علي أن أفعل؟ أولا ، دعونا نتراجع عن غسيل المخ شيئا فشيئا. وبعد ذلك ... دعونا نتظاهر بأننا قد تبنا. "لقد مررت بالكثير من المتاعب في البحث عنك." "أنا ... لا أفهم تمامًا ما تقصده يا جلالة الملك." "كيف أنسى لمستك؟" أمسك بمعصمي ، وأمسك بيدي وحركها برفق على خده - تمامًا مثلما فعلت إليانا ، الشريرة في الرواية ، دائمًا عندما تمدحه. "سأروّضك ، مثلما فعلت - وحشًا لا يمكنه فعل أي شيء بدوني." غطت كفي على خده ثم شفتيه. وضع عليها قبلة قصيرة قبل أن يسحب يدي ببطء

description.en:
The only real villain in the novel, took a handsome man and tamed him for the rest of his life. After putting his fear to the limit, he learned to plead with her, becoming a beast from which he could never escape even if he loosened his leash. However, one day, the beast falls in love and becomes emperor with the woman who saved him, and plunges the evil woman into an eternal bondage.

---
I've posessed the body of the sociopathic villainess, Illyana! An evil villainess who picks up a boy named Magnus and raises him however she pleases... that Illyana is me?!

"I am going to tame you into a beast that cannot do anything without me. Just as you had done to me."

And after 2 years, he who had become an emperor began his revenge. Excuse me, author! Illyana was the sinner but why must I suffer his vengeance? I was just a normal reader named Yuna!

---

description.fr:
Iliana, la maléfique méchante d'un roman recueille un beau garçon qu'elle dompte comme une bête. À l'aide de drogues et de lavage de cerveau, L'homme laisse peu à peu place à la bête jusqu'à ce que l'héroïne le sauve. La bête deviendra l'empereur du pays et punira la méchante pour l'éternité. C'est une histoire qui aurait pu m'amuser si je n'avais pas été transportée dans le corps de la méchante au beau milieu du roman. Que faire de cette bête rampant à mes pieds? Comment échapper à la terrible fin qui m'attend?

Cani kadın İllyana oldum! Magnus adındaki bir çocuğu yanına alıp onu istediği gibi yetiştiren kötü kadın İllyana… Ben İllyana oldum öyle mi?!

Ve 2 yıl sonra imparator olup intikamını almaya başladı. Pardon, yazar! İllyana günahkardı ama neden onun intikamını almak zorundayım? Ben sadece Yuna adında normal bir okuyucuydum!

description.uk:
Єдина справжня лиходійка у романі взяла красеня і приборкала його назавжди. 
Дійшовши межі та ставши звіром, він навчився благати її. Від сутності його неможливо втекти навіть якщо розірвати повідець. Та це триває тільки доти, поки він не стає імператором, закохується в рятівницю та занурює лиходійку у вічне рабство. 
Я потрапила у ту частину, де головний герой ще не приборканий повністю. 
Що робити? Спочатку приборкати його повністю, а потім покаятись? 
«Це важко забути».
«Що ви маєте на увазі… Я не знаю, Ваша Величносте Імператор».
«Як я можу забути цей твій дотик?»
Він схопив мене за руку, підніс її до щоки й обережно потерся.
Так само, як завжди робила лиходійка у романі, коли хвалила його.
«Я приборкаю тебе. Як ти зробила зі мною, звіром, який без тебе нічого не може зробити».
Долоня, що так ненавмисно торкнулася його щоки, досягла губ. Він коротко поцілував долоню, потім повільно прибрав руку...

description.en:
29 year old Kou Kousaka is an ordinary salaryman working overtime in a black company when he dies and is sent to another world.   
  
He is given the option to become a sage, hero, or demon king. However, he chooses none of them and instead acquires a hidden skill: the ability to store items in a limitless inventory, immediately dismantle them into materials, and then use them to create something new.  He then starts his life as an adventurer.

description.en:
I’ve transmigrated into the body of the wife of the mad villain emperor in an angsty novel!
How will I escape? By running away quietly when the saintess he’ll become obsessed with appears.

This love-blind emperor won’t even remember that I exist once he lays eyes on the saintess! I really didn’t do anything. All I did was lay as low as I could so that I wouldn’t get on my crazy husband’s nerves…. But the villain emperor has asked me to return to the palace with him, and not the saintess. But she’s already here! Why are you obessessing over me?

description.en:
After 100 years of hard work, the hero, chrome, has become the world’s only Chronomancer. However, by the time he became the world’s strongest, all the people and towns he wanted to protect were lost.

And so the course he chose… is to go back to his childhood and start his life all over again…?!

This is the ultimate story of time-lapse fantasy!
description.pt-br:
Após 100 anos de trabalho duro, o herói, Chrome, tornou-se o único Chronomancer do mundo. No entanto, no momento em que ele se tornou o mais forte do mundo, todas as pessoas e cidades que ele queria proteger estavam perdidas.

E assim o curso que ele escolheu... é voltar à sua infância e começar sua vida de novo...?!

Esta é a melhor história de fantasia de lapso temporal!

description.en:
Cheon Seju, had no choice but to join an organization to avenge his dead sister. After losing all hope in life, he meets a boy who reminds him of his sister and offers him a small act of kindness. 

If I had known that my light heart would become so heavy, I wouldn't have brought you with me.



"I told you, you'll always come first......." 

His gaze usually fierce gaze was different today. 
Cheon Seju's gaze was gentle, sweet and persistent.

"So take responsibility".

Cheon Seju was my first everything. He was the first person to ever reach out a hand to me, and gaze upon me. Sejin only accepted the man's hand because he offered it first and he only ever gazed upon him because he gazed upon him first. And that is how he fell in love with this sweet and affectionate man.

Sejin realized that he no longer wanted to be separated from Cheon Seju.
Where ever he goes, I'll go. 

"You are all I have left now......."

description.fr: Kwon Nameun, jeune scénariste, a récemment connu un revers de carrière ainsi qu'un dilemme romantique. Alors qu'elle retrouve son béguin de lycée qui l'a larguée sans pitié il ya sept ans, comment est-elle censée affronter ses sentiments pour cet adonis devenu acteur, pour qui elle s'est un jour engagé sur la voie de l' écriture de scripts ? Elle doit se persuader qu'elle a déjà lâché prise. Heureusement, elle rencontre un chanteur sympathique, doux et beau, qui lui fait des blagues à l'heure du déjeuner, avec qui elle a des conversations nocturnes et peut-être… une raison parfaite… de lâcher prise totalement. Est-ce juste ? Peut-elle vraiment lâcher prise sur son ancien amant ?

But... isn't this Li Zhixu a beta?
description.zh: 唐朝因为心理阴影从未经历第二性征的发作，因此她一直以贝塔的身份在做平面模特。在意外与一个欧米伽经历了甜蜜后，她发现自己能够且只能够接近这位欧米伽。第二天她发现自己的新同事李之叙，似乎正是那个她？可是……这个李之叙明明是个贝塔？

The story depicts the daily life of Akanabe-sensei, who lavishes praise on Sakieda without embarrassment, and Sakieda, who tries to accept it all gracefully.

description.en:
Growing up in the late 16th century Sengoku era Japan, Shinmen Takezou is shunned by the local villagers as a devil child due to his wild and violent nature. Running away from home with a fellow boy at age 17, Takezo joins the Toyotomi army to fight the Tokugawa clan at the Battle of Sekigahara. However, the Tokugawa win a crushing victory, leading to nearly three hundred years of Shogunate rule. Takezo and his friend manage to survive the battle and afterwards swear to do great things with their lives. However, after their paths separate, Takezo becomes a wanted criminal and must change his name and his nature in order to escape an ignoble death.  
  
**Awards:**
- Won the 24th Kodansha Manga Award in the general category in 2000.
- Won the Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2002 
**Note:** was nominated for the 2003 Eisner Award in the Best Writer/Artist category.
description.es:
Creciendo en el Japón de la era Sengoku de finales del siglo XVI, Shinmen Takezou es rechazado por los aldeanos locales como un niño demonio debido a su naturaleza salvaje y violenta. A los 17 años, Takezou se escapa de casa con un compañero y se une al ejército Toyotomi para luchar contra el clan Tokugawa en la batalla de Sekigahara. Sin embargo, los Tokugawa obtienen una aplastante victoria, lo que da lugar a casi trescientos años de gobierno del Shogunato. Takezou y su amigo consiguen sobrevivir a la batalla y después juran hacer grandes cosas con sus vidas. Sin embargo, cuando sus caminos se separan, Takezou se convierte en un criminal buscado y debe cambiar su nombre y su naturaleza para escapar de una muerte innoble.  
  
**Premios:**
    - Ganó el 24º Premio Kodansha de Manga en la categoría general en 2000.
    - Ganó el Premio Cultural Tezuka Osamu en 2002
    **Nota:** fue nominado al Premio Eisner 2003 en la categoría de Mejor Escritor/Artista.

description.en: Kim Seojoon, a freshman college student leading a normal daily life, awoke one day to find himself transported into a fantasy world straight out of a webtoon or web novel or something like that. As he began to get excited about potentially having the role of a male lead character, a shocking event unfolded before his eyes—a murder of an imperial family. Consequently, Kim Seojoon found himself imprisoned in the world's prison, 'Gehenna'. Will he be able to navigate the treacherous paths of this unfamiliar world?

**A romcom fantasy oneshot by Yi Myeonji.**

In the neighboring lands of the Humila Empire and Tiloritiz, silence reigns despite their proximity. Suddenly, the demons launch relentless attacks on the humans, causing widespread destruction. Princess Roselle of Humila takes up the challenge to confront the Demon King and end the conflict. Inside the Demon Castle, she encounters a surprising adversary: a timid Demon King. Amidst their confrontation, Roselle finds herself unexpectedly drawn to his hidden charms and she proposes...?

Park Taejoo is often kicked out of places he’s lived in because of his menacing appearance. 
Through his friend’s introduction, he comes to live with Joo Hajin, the elite of the Economics Department. 
But the moment he opens the door, he sees condoms and sex toys scattered everywhere. Come to find out that his roommate is a notorious sex addict! 
Among the misunderstandings and chaotic lifestyle, they become conscious of each other at some point… 
And so, will these two be able to get along living in the same house?!
description.fr: Park Tae-joo, qui a souvent été expulsé de chez lui à cause de son apparence intimidante, emménage chez Ju Ha-jin, un élite du département d'économie, grâce à une introduction d'amis. Dès qu'il ouvre la porte, il découvre un spectacle choquant : des préservatifs et des jouets sexuels éparpillés. Il se rend compte que son nouveau colocataire est un addict du sexe notoire ! Alors qu'ils vivent ensemble, jonglant entre malentendus et situations comiques, ils commencent progressivement à prendre conscience l'un de l'autre... Ces deux-là pourront-ils vivre paisiblement sous le même toit ?!

altTitles.en: Return of the Former Hero

altTitles.ja: 帰ってきた元勇者

description.en:
Once, a hero has been summoned to a different world in order to defeat the demon king. After the war stretching 3 years ended, the commendable hero slayed the demon king. And he was forcibly deported back to earth after being dismissed.  
  
*"Give me a break!  
Elves in addition to beast race, dwarfs and demon race.  
Even though I wanted to make a harem in the different world I saved!  
My dream will not come true on earth, where there is no magic at all."*  
  
Thus, the hero returns on his own.  
Without the blunder of being extradited to earth this time, he will build a harem of his own in a different world.  
  


---
description.pt:
Uma vez, um herói foi convocado para um mundo diferente para derrotar o rei demônio. Depois da guerra que durou 3 anos, o herói louvável que matou o rei demônio, foi mandado à força de volta à Terra depois de ser dispensado.  
  
"Me dá um tempo!  
Elfos, além da raça de bestas, anões e demônios.  
Mesmo que eu quisesse fazer um harém no mundo diferente que salvei!  
Meu sonho não se tornará realidade na terra, onde não há mágica nenhuma. "  
  
Assim, o herói retorna por conta própria.  
Sem a asneira de ser extraditado para a Terra desta vez, ele construirá seu próprio harém em um mundo diferente..

Agnes, who was ridiculed in the social circles for being an unfashionable noble, happened to help Nazelbert, the duke's son, who had been betrothed to the Princess. However, the Princess saw this and ordered Nazelbert to marry Agnes as punishment. Isn't it terrible to marry me as a punishment? Look, he seems to hate it too. Wait, he doesn't?

This is a story about an unfashionable noble and a duke's son, who grow closer to each other.
